alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 12:55PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Scotts Bluff, northwestern Banner, southeastern Goshen and northeastern Laramie Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1254 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Meriden Rest Area, or 30 miles south of Torrington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Grange, Yoder, Hawk Springs Recreation Area, Hawk Springs Campground and Hawk Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; Goshen County
